Data: Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run short of a length and he tucks it down to midwicket
Johnson to Thirimanne, no run more the Johnson we know, digs it in short and on the body, Thirimanne very awkwardly fended it off, took his eyes off the ball, could so easily have got a top edge
Johnson to Thirimanne, no run short of a length and he pushes it to the off side
Johnson to Thirimanne, no run comes forward and across and pushes it to the off side
Johnson to Thirimanne, no run short of a length and angles across him, he steers it to the off side
Johnson to Thirimanne, no run bangs it in short on the body and he ducks and the ball hits him flush on the shoulder
Lyon to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs one bounce and four, brave on Lyon to continue to toss it up, chips down the track and carts him over midwicket, top shot
Lyon to Mahela Jayawardene, no run stays back and clips it with the turn to the on side
Lyon to Mahela Jayawardene, SIX runs shot of the day so far! Tossed up and he chips down the track and lofts him high and clean over the sightscreen, as straight as straight can get
Lyon to Mahela Jayawardene, no run comes forward and works it to the on side
Lyon to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run gets across and clips it to the on side for a single
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run tossed up and he gets well forward and defends

Starc to Mahela Jayawardene, OUT and the bowling change does the trick! Comes over the wicket, lands it outside off, Mahela goes forward and across to drive and gets a thick outside edge at waist height to Clarke at first slip, they check for the no-ball and Starc's heel was just behind the popping crease before he dragged it forward, lega
Starc to Thilan Samaraweera, no run angles across him and he shoulders arms
Starc to Thilan Samaraweera, 1 run pushes it towards cover to get off the mark

Starc to Thirimanne, FOUR runs length delivery, neatly punched down the ground, there's no mid-on so Siddle has to chase from mid-off and he makes a mess of it on the slide near the rope, looks a bit sheepish
Starc to Thirimanne, no run bangs it in short and he evades the bouncer
Starc to Thirimanne, 1 wide hits the deck even harder and it's another bouncer, he is penalised for it
Starc to Thirimanne, no run bowls it fuller and he clips it with the angle to the on side
Lyon to Thilan Samaraweera, no run tossed up and he comes forward and defends
Lyon to Thilan Samaraweera, 2 runs tossed up further and Samaraweera plays an airy drive wide of gully, should have been three
Lyon to Thilan Samaraweera, no run stays behind the line and defends
Lyon to Thilan Samaraweera, no run flatter delivery and he gets forward and defends
Lyon to Thilan Samaraweera, no run gives it more air and he comes forward and defends
Lyon to Thilan Samaraweera, no run comes forward and gets an inside edge to the pads

Starc to Thirimanne, FOUR runs nicely driven! Starc bowls a friendly half volley outside off and he leans forward and across and drives wide of cover, he hit a few in the air through the off side earlier but was in full control of this one
Starc to Thirimanne, no run good comebck by Starc as he bowls it short and Thirimanne manages to fend it off...just
Starc to Thirimanne, 2 runs keeps it short and he punches it wide of backward point for a couple
Starc to Thirimanne, 1 run gives him width and he steers it wide of point
Starc to Thilan Samaraweera, 2 runs on the pads and he clicks it in the air over midwicket, didn't look in full control of the shot

Starc to Thilan Samaraweera, 4 runs loose-cannon moment from Starc! Samaraweera drilled it back to the bowler and was on the walk, Starc gathered and flung it back...missed the target and the keeper Wade - four bonus runs
Bird to Thirimanne, FOUR runs his driving through the off side is getting better and better! Full and wide outside off and he uses the pace on the ball to steer it wide of point
Bird to Thirimanne, no run sort of a length and he leaves it alone to the keeper
Bird to Thirimanne, no run fuller delivery and he pushes it towards the covers
Bird to Thirimanne, no run drifts on the pads and he tucks it towards midwicket
Bird to Thirimanne, no run good length on middle and he covers the line to defend
Bird to Thirimanne, no run angles it across and he watchfully leaves it to the keeper
Starc to Thilan Samaraweera, no run bit wide of the off stump and he reaches out and steers it to the off side
Starc to Thilan Samaraweera, no run fuller delivery and he comes across and defends to the off side
Starc to Thilan Samaraweera, no run little shorter in length and he gets across and defends
Starc to Thilan Samaraweera, no run fuller and angling inwards and he defends back to the bowler
Starc to Thilan Samaraweera, 1 run bowls it across and gives him width and he punches it wide of cover for a single
Starc to Thirimanne, no run keeps it short and the batsman has to negotiate some steep bounce, he reaches out and fends it off
Bird to Thilan Samaraweera, 1 run starts off the over with a bouncer which Samaraweera swivels and pulls with control down to fine leg
Bird to Thirimanne, no run angles across him and he stays back and defends
Bird to Thirimanne, no run gets a nice shape across and Thirimanne watchfully lets it go
Bird to Thirimanne, no run fullish and angling across and he comes forward and leaves it alone
Bird to Thirimanne, no run fullish in length outside off and he drives him down to mid-off
Bird to Thirimanne, 2 runs drifting on the pads and Thirimanne chipped this over midwicket, slightly checked his shot
Siddle to Thilan Samaraweera, no run hits a good length outside off and he safely leaves it alone to the keeper
Siddle to Thilan Samaraweera, 1 run just drifts on the pads and he clips him wide of midwicket, Siddle needs to keep it around the off stump
Siddle to Thirimanne, 3 runs full and angling across and he does well to steer it through the gap at backward point, not enough to reach the rope
Siddle to Thilan Samaraweera, no run gets some late swing and he comes behind the line and defends
Siddle to Thilan Samaraweera, no run lands outside the off stump and he safely leaves it alone
Siddle to Thilan Samaraweera, no run good length on the off stump and he gets across and defends down the track
Bird to Thirimanne, no run good length outside the off stump and he leaves it alone
Bird to Thirimanne, no run nearly gives it away! It was outside off and he went for the slash and missed, extra bounce on that one
Bird to Thirimanne, no run angles across him and he shoulders arms
Bird to Thirimanne, no run goes back at the crease and defends to the off side
Bird to Thirimanne, no run angles it across and fuller and he leaves it alone, gets some away movement
Bird to Thirimanne, no run goes back at the crease and defends down the track
Siddle to Thilan Samaraweera, no run fullish in length outside off and he pushes it down to cover
Siddle to Thilan Samaraweera, no run holds the length back slightly and he defends back to the bowler
Siddle to Thilan Samaraweera, no run fuller in length and he tucks it back to the bowler
Siddle to Thilan Samaraweera, no run fuller and angling in and he closes the face of the bat and tucks it to the on side
Siddle to Thilan Samaraweera, no run good length outside off and he comes across and softly defends it

Siddle to Thilan Samaraweera, OUT trapped in front and Samaraweera was walking, as it so appeared! Siddle gets this one to nip back in off the pitch, Samaraweera was trapped on the back foot, hit plumb in front of middle and leg as he tried to turn it to the on side
Hussey to Thirimanne, no run on target, outside off and he safely defends
Hussey to Thirimanne, no run gets it to drift in a bit, safely defended
Hussey to Thirimanne, 1 run angles it across him and he reaches out and steers it wide of point
Hussey to Angelo Mathews, no run gets some late inswing and Mathews comes across and defends
Hussey to Angelo Mathews, no run making the batsman play so that's good, comes across, covers the swing and defends
Hussey to Angelo Mathews, no run full outside off and he jams it out to mid-off
Siddle to Thirimanne, no run half volley and neatl driven on the front foot and Hughes does really well at cover to slide and save a certain boundary
Siddle to Thirimanne, no run comes back in and he stays back and defends
Siddle to Thirimanne, no run hits a good length outside off and he gets his pad across and leaves it alone
Siddle to Thirimanne, no run angles it inwards from round the wicket, he comes across and defends
Siddle to Thirimanne, (no ball) he oversteps the crease, gets across and defends to the on side
Siddle to Thirimanne, no run goes back at the crease and defends solidly
Siddle to Thirimanne, no run stays back and defends down the track and we will have one more over before rea
Hussey to Angelo Mathews, no run stays back at the crease and defends to the on side
Hussey to Angelo Mathews, no run fuller in length and he softly pushes it to the on side
Hussey to Angelo Mathews, no run fullish in length and he jams it out towards mid-on
Hussey to Angelo Mathews, no run shorter in length and he stays back and punches it towards cover
Hussey to Angelo Mathews, no run
Hussey to Angelo Mathews, no run sprays that wide outside off and he doesn't touch it, it's tea
Johnson to Thirimanne, 2 runs full and on the pads and he clips it away down to fine leg
Johnson to Thirimanne, no run this is a good inswinging yorker, he just about manages to dig it out
Johnson to Thirimanne, FOUR runs Johnson fails to control the swing, he drifts on the pads and he shuffles and clips it down to fine leg
Johnson to Thirimanne, no run keeps it full and he defends to the off side
Johnson to Thirimanne, no run full on the off stump and defended to the covers
Johnson to Thirimanne, no run keeps it full and straight and he pushes it back to the bowler
Bird to Angelo Mathews, no run
Bird to Angelo Mathews, no run fullish delivery angling towards the pads and he clips it down to midwicket
Bird to Angelo Mathews, no run good length on middle and leg and he works it down to mid-on
Bird to Angelo Mathews, no run holds the length back and he stays back and defends
Bird to Angelo Mathews, no run good length on middle and off and he goes back and defends
Bird to Angelo Mathews, no run gets half forward and softly pushes it back to the bowler
Johnson to Thirimanne, FOUR runs bang! He drags the length short and Thirimanne swivels and pulls with authority in front of square, big gap there, he was in full control of that
Johnson to Thirimanne, no run well played, this was kicking up on him off a good length and he went forward and did well to play with soft hands
Johnson to Thirimanne, 3 runs fifty for Thirimanne and it's always good news for SL when a young player scores a Test fifty, he comes forward to a full delivery and drives wide of cover
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run angles it across him and he defends back to the bowler
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run full and moving away and he defends to the off side
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run gets on the back foot and defends to the off side
Bird to Thirimanne, 1 run shapes across the left-hander and he angles it down to third man
Bird to Angelo Mathews, FOUR runs swings it towards the pads and he clips him wide of mid-on and midwicket, the fielder gives chase, slides and nearly cleans up the drinks cart across the rope
Bird to Angelo Mathews, no run full on the off stump and defended to the covers
Bird to Angelo Mathews, no run gets across and he pushes it down to mid-off
Bird to Angelo Mathews, no run drifts inwards and he defends with soft hands towards mid-on
Bird to Angelo Mathews, 1 run comes in and he clips it with the angle down to fine leg
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, FOUR runs nicely driven, poor ball, full and wide and slanting across, he had enough width to caress it through the covers
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run angles across and he pushes it down to cover
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run this one swings back in towards the pads and he checks the shot to midwicket
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run hits a good length outside the off stump and Mathews stays back and defends
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run goes back at the crease and softly clips it to the on side
Lyon to Thirimanne, 1 run clips him down to midwicket
Lyon to Angelo Mathews, no run flatter delivery and he stays back and defends
Lyon to Angelo Mathews, no run tossed up and comes forward and defends
Lyon to Angelo Mathews, no run gives it more air and he plonks forward and defends
Lyon to Angelo Mathews, no run tossed up and he presses forward and defends
Lyon to Angelo Mathews, no run comes well forward and he steers it to the off side
Johnson to Thirimanne, no run fullish delivery on the pads and he drills it to the on side
Johnson to Thirimanne, no run pitched up and he drives this one down to mid-off
Johnson to Thirimanne, no run gets forward and across and he pushes it to the covers

Johnson to Thirimanne, FOUR runs slashed over the slips! Can't call that a chance, it was short and he had some width, put a lot of power behind that slash and it went over Clarke who jumped at first slip
Johnson to Thirimanne, no run fuller and straighter and he comes forward and defends
Johnson to Thirimanne, 1 run full on middle and leg and worked down to square leg
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run tossed up and he comes forward and leaves it alone
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run tossed up, comes forward and defends
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run flighted outside off and he pushes it towards cover
Lyon to Thirimanne, FOUR runs neatly driven! Flighted outside off, gives him width outside off and he stays beside the line, bends and drives square on the off side
Lyon to Thirimanne, FOUR runs stays on the back foot this time, dropped shorter, he rocks back and across and cuts wide of point, Warner chases but can't cut it off
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run tossed up and he comes forward and defends

Starc to Angelo Mathews, FOUR runs his first ball in his previous spell got a wicket, this time it's a boundary. Loosener outside off, full and Mathews went forward and pushes it down the ground wide of mid-off
Starc to Angelo Mathews, no run left alone to the keeper and this one keeps a touch low, not much of an effort ball
Starc to Angelo Mathews, no run fullish delivery angling across and he pushes it to mid-off
Starc to Angelo Mathews, no run good length on middle and leg and he clips him down to midwicket
Starc to Angelo Mathews, no run short and wide and slapped away and short cover gets in the way, looked like a boundary the moment it left the bat
Starc to Angelo Mathews, no run fuller and wider and nicely driven off the middle of the bat but straight to mid-off
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run tossed up, he stays back and cuts him towards cover
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run gives it more air and he comes forward and drives to mid-off
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run ouch! Wade's hit on the shoulder, Lyon tossed it up and the batsman was forward, extra bounce, catches the thin edge (Hot Spot) and his Wade flush on the shoulder
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run tossed up and he drives him down to mid-on
Lyon to Thirimanne, FOUR runs tossed up and he has some width to work with, he rocks back and stylishly slaps it wide of point
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run tossed up and he gets well forward and defends
Starc to Angelo Mathews, no run
Starc to Angelo Mathews, no run lands it outside off and he shoulders arms, gets a nice angle across
Starc to Angelo Mathews, no run fuller delivery and he works it down to midwicket
Starc to Angelo Mathews, no run that was a half volley on the pads which he should have put away, flicked straight to midwicket
Starc to Angelo Mathews, 2 runs drifts on the leg stump and he shuffles and clips it behind square on the on side
Starc to Angelo Mathews, no run gives him width and he punches it down to mid-off, Mathews has hit quite a few good shots straight to the fielders
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run tossed up and he gets forward and defends
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run turn and bounce, he watchfully leaves it alone
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run well tossed up and he comes forward and defends
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run
Lyon to Thirimanne, SIX runs good use of the feet, Lyon tosses it up and he chips down the track and lofts cleanly over wide long-off, it was just over the rope
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run tossed up and he gets forward and defends
Starc to Angelo Mathews, no run

Starc to Angelo Mathews, OUT Hussey takes his second catch! Once again Starc doesn't take long to strike in a new spell, it was angled across the right-hander, Mathews was forward and across and the edge traveled to Hussey at second slip, in fact he took his eyes off the ball slightly before taking it
Starc to Chandimal, no run keeps it on the off stump and he comes forward and defends
Starc to Chandimal, no run bowls him the bouncer and he bends down slightly to evade it
Starc to Chandimal, FOUR runs shot! It was short and wide outside off, Chandimal wasn't going to let that go, hopped at the crease and slapped it over point
Starc to Chandimal, no run comes forward and pushes it to mid-off
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run
Lyon to Thirimanne, 3 runs tossed up and he goes back and cuts him wide of backward point for three
Lyon to Chandimal, no run flighted on the off stump and he comes forward and defends
Lyon to Chandimal, no run gets forward and across and defends
Lyon to Chandimal, no run full outside off and pushed towards cover
Lyon to Chandimal, no run quicker one and he pushes it to cover
Starc to Thirimanne, no run
Starc to Thirimanne, no run
Starc to Thirimanne, no run
Starc to Thirimanne, no run
Starc to Thirimanne, 1 run
Starc to Chandimal, no run
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run tossed up and he comes forward and defends
Lyon to Thirimanne, 3 runs that was well played in the end, tossed up from round the wicket, it bounces more and he rides the bounce and plays a controlled glide to third man
Lyon to Chandimal, no run comes forward and pushes it down to mid-off
Lyon to Chandimal, no run gets well forward and clips it down to midwicket
Lyon to Chandimal, no run tossed up and he defends back to the bowler
Lyon to Chandimal, no run
Siddle to Thirimanne, no run that's a good leave, just leaves the left-hander outside off and he watches it through to the keeper
Siddle to Thirimanne, no run chipped in the air and it just drops short of mid-on, luckily he checks the shot
Siddle to Thirimanne, no run
Siddle to Thirimanne, FOUR runs nicely driven! Fullish in length on middle and off and he drives crisply down the ground and beats mid-off
Siddle to Thirimanne, FOUR runs back to back fours! Fullish outside the off stump and he comes forward and drives him wide of cover to take him to the 90s
Siddle to Thirimanne, no run
Lyon to Chandimal, no run
Lyon to Chandimal, no run tossed up and he comes forward and defends
Lyon to Chandimal, no run
Lyon to Chandimal, FOUR runs he loves giving the spinners the charge! Tossed up and he gets to the pitch if it and launches him over mid-on
Lyon to Chandimal, FOUR runs gets down to sweep and he fetches that from outside off and places it to fine leg
Lyon to Chandimal, no run tossed up and he comes forward and knocks it to mid-on
Siddle to Thirimanne, no run fullish on middle and off and he pushes him down to mid-on
Siddle to Thirimanne, no run god length on the off stump and he stays back and defends
Siddle to Thirimanne, 1 run short of a length on middle and leg and he tucks him down to square leg
Siddle to Chandimal, no run good length outside the off stump and he pushes it softly to the off side
Siddle to Chandimal, no run good length outside the off stump and he pushes it to the off side
Siddle to Chandimal, no run moves back in slightly and he comes forward and across and pushes it towards mid-off
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run tossed up and he comes forward and defends
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run

Lyon to Thirimanne, OUT soft dismissal, good catch and Thirimanne has to go for 91! Lyon tossed it up from round the wicket, outside off, Thirimanne couldn't resist going for the uppish driver over cover, he miscued it towards cover point, Warner ran to his right from cover and timed his dive well and took the catch
Lyon to Chandimal, no run tossed up and he comes forward and pushes it to mid-on
Lyon to Chandimal, no run tossed up and clipped towards midwicket
Lyon to Chandimal, FOUR runs tossed up outside off and he has a lot of width to work with, smashes it wide of cover for a boundary
Siddle to Prasad, no run good length on the off stump and Prasad does well to defend
Siddle to Prasad, no run drifts towards the pads and he clips it to the on side
Siddle to Prasad, 2 runs gives him some width and he steers it just wide of gully

Siddle to Prasad, OUT another poor shot leads to a wicket! This was short on the off stump, Prasad tries to backhand that one over mid-on presumably, goes back at the crease and completely mistimes it, it travels low to mid-on where Starc takes a good low catch falling forward
Siddle to Herath, no run lands it outside off and he safely leaves it alone
Siddle to Herath, no run he gets across and gets an inside edge to the pads, short leg is in place
Lyon to Chandimal, no run tossed up down the leg side, he walks across his stumps and tries to sweep but misses
Lyon to Chandimal, 1 run stays back and clips it with the turn to the on side
Lyon to Herath, no run turn and bounce and he stabs at it, keeps the ball down
Lyon to Herath, no run defends close to the pads and there's a half-hearted appeal
Lyon to Herath, no run
Lyon to Herath, FOUR runs this was well played! Tossed up and he didn't have much room to cut, he goes back and slaps it jut wide of point
Siddle to Chandimal, no run too close to cut and he ends up chopping it down to point
Siddle to Chandimal, no run fuller and honing in on the off stump and he pushes this one to the bowler
Siddle to Chandimal, no run overpitched and he pushes this one down to cover
Siddle to Chandimal, no run short and wide outside off and he cuts to point
Siddle to Chandimal, no run fullish in length on the off stump and he punches it down to mid-off
Siddle to Chandimal, no run swing and a miss, this wasn't far from the off stump and the inside edge
Lyon to Herath, no run tossed up and he comes forward and defends
Lyon to Herath, no run tries to cut this one and he ends up inside edging to the pad
Lyon to Herath, no run
Lyon to Herath, no run tossed up and he gets across and pats it to the off side
Lyon to Herath, no run cuts and misses, Lyon's keeping them interested with his turn and bounce
Lyon to Herath, no run fuller delivery and he drills it to the off side
Starc to Chandimal, no run short of a length outside off and he stays back and defends
Starc to Chandimal, no run short and angling across him and he cuts him down to gully where Lyon stops it
Starc to Chandimal, no run stays back at the crease and defends
Starc to Chandimal, no run this one reared up a bit and Chandimal did well to keep it down
Starc to Chandimal, 2 leg byes drifts on the pads and he runs it down to fine leg
Starc to Chandimal, FOUR runs short and he swivels and pulls this one down to deep square leg, really controlled the pull
Lyon to Herath, 1 run risky run! Herath dropped it towards cover and there was hesitation, Chandimal sprinted and made his ground
Lyon to Chandimal, no run comes forward to drive and he gets an edge to the pads
Lyon to Chandimal, 2 runs tossed up and he's not afraid to sweep in front of square
Lyon to Chandimal, no run
Lyon to Chandimal, 1 run tossed up and he pushes it to mid-on
Lyon to Herath, no run spins back in and he shoulders arms

Starc to Chandimal, OUT Yorker! Troubles the best of them, Starc's making it a habit striking early in a spell, this was angled in beautifully from the off stump, lands on the blockhole, Chandimal wasn't quick enough to get his bat down, crashes between middle and leg
Starc to Lakmal, no run nips back and he's nearly squared up, manages to get some bat on ball
Starc to Lakmal, no run Lakmal backs away on seeing the ball pitched short, he then somehow gets some bat behind it
Starc to Lakmal, no run he backs away to a short ball and he swishes and misses it completely
Starc to Lakmal, 1 run moves away again and he ends up pushing it wide of cover
Starc to Herath, no run stays back at the crease and softly pushes it to the covers
Bird to Lakmal, no run Lakmal's playing only one way, he makes room and swishes and misses
Bird to Lakmal, no run seems determined to give his wicket away, pokes at one moving away and misses
Bird to Lakmal, 1 run makes room and he slashes and the top edge clears the slips and goes to third man
Bird to Herath, OUT and that's the end of Herath, he has gone for a big heave and skied the ball to mid-off, Peter Siddle takes a comfortable catch. This could end quickly now for Sri Lanka
Bird to Lakmal, no run keeps a yorker out nicely
Bird to Lakmal, no run left alone outside off
Starc to Pradeep, no run Starc is around the wicket to Pradeep, who awkwardly fends off a short ball
Starc to Pradeep, no run another short ball and Pradeep is able to duck underneath it
Starc to Pradeep, no run way down the leg side here. All Starc really needs to do is get it on line and Pradeep may be in trouble
Starc to Pradeep, no run again, no shot required from Pradeep

Starc to Pradeep, FOUR runs full and straight and Pradeep has managed not only to keep it out, he has clipped it through midwicket for a boundary! He now has one-quarter of his highest ever first-class score
Starc to Pradeep, 1 run tries to leave this one alone outside off but the ball runs off his bat behind point
Bird to Pradeep, no run defended away to the off side
Bird to Pradeep, no run Bird gets one to move away outside off and Pradeep goes the drive but can't connect
Bird to Pradeep, no run worked off the hips towards square leg
Bird to Pradeep, no run that's an old-fashioned tail-ender's heave, he's tried to clear long on but hasn't made contact, the ball sails through to Wade
Bird to Pradeep, no run beaten again as Pradeep flashes outside off
Bird to Pradeep, no run again, Bird just can't find the edge and this one beats the bat of Pradeep once more
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run sprays that full and wide and Warner does well to slide at backward point and cut that off
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run angles it across the right-hander, he's not interested in chasing that
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run Johnson switches to a fuller length and still Jayawardene offers no shot
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run and expectedly bowls the bouncer, two men in the deep and the batsman ducks
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run fullish in length outside the off stump and he goes well across and defends to the off side
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run loss of concentration there, he wanted to leave the ball but ended up knocking it on the bounce to slip
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run comes forward a touch late and defends
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run gives it a lot of air and he comes forward and defends
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run flighted outside off and pushed to the covers
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run gives himself a bit of room to drive past cover but can't squeeze it past the fielder
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run tossed up and he comes forward and defends
Lyon to Thirimanne, no run goes for another cover drive and he misses it completely, Lyon teases him in flight
Starc to Lakmal, no run Starc still coming around the wicket and aims for the stumps, Lakmal backs off and connects, just driving back to the bowler

Starc to Lakmal, 1 wide bouncer and an extraordinary swipe from Lakmal, who almost plays with a vertical bat above his head as he tries to swat this away - instead it sails through and Wade jumps up to save some byes. But it is called a wide
Starc to Lakmal, no run Starc comes over the wicket now and Lakmal defends
Starc to Lakmal, no run another swing and a miss as Starc bounces this one too far over the stumps
Starc to Lakmal, no run full and wide of off and another one goes through to Wade
Starc to Lakmal, 1 run full and straight and driven towards mid off, the batsmen take off for a run that perhaps isn't there, but Siddle's throw to the striker's end is off target
Starc to Pradeep, no run off a thick edge towards point
Bird to Lakmal, no run banged in short and this one lobs off the shoulder of the bat, but lands safely short of point
Bird to Lakmal, no run again this one beats the outside edge
Bird to Lakmal, no run Bird is wondering how this wicket isn't coming - Lakmal goes for a huge heave and this ball almost kisses the off stump as it goes through to Wade. So, so close
Bird to Lakmal, no run swing and a miss. Again.
Bird to Lakmal, no run much too wide from Bird now, Lakmal does try to swing at this but can't reach it as he's backing away a bit from leg stump
Bird to Lakmal, no run outside off, keeps low and another one that is not interrupted by bat on its way to Wade
Johnson to Pradeep, FOUR runs welcome back Mitchell Johnson! Pradeep slams this down the ground to long-on for a boundary!
Johnson to Pradeep, no run a big swing now from Pradeep and this ball just goes over the top of off stump, and perhaps a fraction wide of it as well
Johnson to Pradeep, no run full and straight and Pradeep is keeping those ones out, really frustrating the Australians. He drives this one to cover
Johnson to Pradeep, no run defended now back down the pitch
Johnson to Pradeep, 3 runs there's the double figures for Pradeep! He doesn't raise the bat though. Drives this one down the ground wide of mid off
Johnson to Lakmal, 2 runs on the pads now and Lakmal pushes a couple of runs through the leg side

Bird to Pradeep, FOUR runs Bird goes for the yorker but overpitches and this turns out as a full toss on the pads, Pradeep flicks it through midwicket for a boundary. And that's equalled his highest first-class score.
Bird to Pradeep, 1 run bouncer, tries for the pull but it lobs short of cover, they take a single and that is Nuwan Pradeep's best score in a 41-match first-class career
Bird to Lakmal, no run pushed away towards point

Bird to Lakmal, OUT there's the breakthrough at last, Bird finally draws an edge and this one is taken by Michael Hussey at second slip moving to his right. Bird finishes with four wickets and the late finish means Australia won't have to bat tonight
Thanks for joining us. Plenty to read in the coming hours on this game, starting with the report. Do join us tomorrow and thanks for your company!

Day 1: That means Australia will start fresh first thing tomorrow morning. A good day for the hosts after winning the toss. Their fast men, barring Johnson, have contributed. Sri Lanka will be disappointed with this considering they had two batsmen who passed fifty and looked set to score more. They will look back at some shots with regret. There
Last ball before tea

Pradeep to Wade, FOUR runs take that! Field spread on the off side, he leans forward to a full delivery and spanks that on the front foot over extra cover
Pradeep to Wade, 2 runs places this well, he crashes this one on the front foot and places it wide of long-off, knew straightaway it was two
Pradeep to Wade, 2 runs swings and gets an inside edge towards fine leg, rushes the first run and completes the second
Pradeep to Wade, 1 run squirts out a full delivery wide of point and walks the single, over to Bird
Pradeep to Bird, FOUR runs was thinking of two but he gets four! Swings it in on the pads and he clips it nonchalantly wide of midwicket, timed it really well
Herath to Wade, no run tossed up and he swings this one to long-on
Herath to Wade, no run makes room and bashes it down the ground to long-off
Herath to Wade, 2 runs fires that full and flat, he makes room and carves it down to third man, into the 90s
Herath to Wade, 1 run slogs and it goes on the first bounce to deep midwicket
Herath to Bird, no run drifts in and he safely defends it
Herath to Bird, no run flatter delivery and he comes well forward and defends
Lakmal to Wade, no run teases him with width and Wade goes for a wild slash and misses
Lakmal to Wade, FOUR runs almost went all the way! This was full outside off and Wade gives it a thrash off the front foot, just short of the rope at wide long-off, the fielders there don't deter him
Lakmal to Wade, 2 runs slogs and mistimes it to the on side and he hurries the second run

Lakmal to Wade, FOUR runs he gets there! First Test ton in Australia for Wade! He's finding the gaps superbly today, it was full and wide outside off, made room and smashed it past the gap at deep cover, he knew soon that it was going for a four and ran across the pitch and stretched out his arms. He was absolutely delighted, a must-watch
Lakmal to Wade, no run pokes at one outside off and misses
Lakmal to Wade, 1 run Dropped at fine leg! This was short and he went for the hook and it swirled towards fine leg where the fielder got under it and spilled it
And Australia have declared. Australia have a lead of 138. SL will be disappointed they couldn't roll them over this morning for less. Now they will bat out about 15 minutes till lunch.
Innings Start
Australia are out. Nope, no Hussey! Starts off with spin
